name.description: Service name for the connect worker application(s)

virtual_network_name.description: The name of the virtual network to join

cpus.description: CPU shares to allocate to each connect worker instance.

mem.description: Memory (MB) to allocate to each connect worker instance.

heap.description: JVM heap allocation (in MB) for connect worker task; should be ~256MB less than total memory for the instance.

role.description: Deploy connect worker only on nodes with this role.

group_id.description: A unique string that identifies the Connect cluster group this worker belongs to.

bootstrap_servers.title: Kafka bootstrap servers
bootstrap_servers.description: The name of the kafka bootstrapserver. Broker vip (for TLS it is broker-tls.confluent-kafka.l4lb.thisdcos.directory:9093) or comma separated list of broker dns names (like in the kerberos case). Note slahes in a kafka service name have to be removed.

zookeeper_connect.title: Zookeeper connect
zookeeper_connect.description: ... . Note slahes in a kafka service name have to be removed, all excpet the first get replaced by two underscores.

client_security_protocol.title: Kafka client security protocol
client_security_protocol.description: Protocol used to communicate with brokers. Valid values are: PLAINTEXT, SSL, SASL_PLAINTEXT, SASL_SSL

client_sasl_mechanism.title: Kafka client sasl mechanism
client_sasl_mechanism.description: SASL mechanism used for client connections. This may be any mechanism for which a security provider is available. GSSAPI is the default mechanism.

client_sasl_kerberos_service_name.title: Kafka client sasl kerberos service name
client_sasl_kerberos_service_name.description: The Kerberos principal name that Kafka runs as. This can be defined either in Kafka’s JAAS config or in Kafka’s config.

kerberos_jaas_secret.title: Kerberos jaas secret
kerberos_jaas_secret.description: Kerberos jaas secret containing jaas config

kerberos_krb5_secret.title: Kerberos krb5 secret
kerberos_krb5_secret.description: Kerberos krb5 secret containing krb5 config

url.title: Schema registry url
url.description: The base URL for the schema registry.
